snippet: The agreement to supply civilian power technology shows that Russia is pressing ahead with its own vision for ensuring that Iran does not build nuclear weapons.
abstract: Russia reaches agreement to build two new nuclear power reactors in Iran, with the possibility of six more to come, in deal that greatly expands nuclear cooperation between the two countries; approach, which won acceptance from the International Atomic Energy Agency, shows that Russia is pressing ahead with its own vision of ensuring that Iran does not build nuclear weapons.
lead_paragraph: The agreement to supply civilian power technology shows that Russia is pressing ahead with its own vision for ensuring that Iran does not build nuclear weapons.

headline.main: Russia Reaches Deal With Iran to Construct Nuclear Plants
headline.print_headline: Russia Reaches Deal With Iran to Construct Nuclear Plants

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
